extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system is affected by checking the installed version of the software products listed.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?
Is upgrading to CodeMeter V7.60c possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to CodeMeter V7.60c
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install CodeMeter V7.60c from the WIBU-SYSTEMS homepage to fix the vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply General Security Best Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Use general security best practices to protect systems from local and network attacks as described in the application node AH EN INDUSTRIAL SECURITY.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure CodeMeter to Run as Client Only
extracted_playbook.description: Run CodeMeter as client only and use localhost as binding for the CodeMeter communication to prevent remote network attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable or Restrict CmWAN Server
extracted_playbook.description: Check if CmWAN is enabled and disable it if not needed. If running, ensure it is behind a reverse proxy with user authentication and restrict access using a host-based firewall.

extracted_playbook.title: Install Phoenix Contact Activation Wizard Version 1.7
extracted_playbook.description: Install Phoenix Contact Activation Wizard from version 1.7 when available. Regularly check the Phoenix Contact e-Shop for updates.
